ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

dialogStrings:
[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
You are NOT getting this Huge Materia!!
So you WERE after the Huge Materia!

{Tifa}
They're gonna take it on that submarine!

{Cait Sith}
There's the submarine dock just ahead.

{Red XIII}
If we take a short cut,
we might just make it!

Reno
What are you doing?
Help load.

{Barret}
We're gonna help transport
the Huge MateriaReno!

{Yuffie}
I'm SURE! You want me to do manual labor?

{Cloud}
Either give it to us or else.

Reno
Unfortunately, I don't have
time to deal with you.

Reno
My priority is the Huge Materia!

{Cait Sith}
Oh no! It left the dock

{Barret}
Damn!
So they was just buyin' time!?

{Red XIII}
But it's already in the water!

{Cid}
Hold on to your horses!
Let's take it from 'em!!
You're not taking over this ship!

{Cid}
Hey, hey, hey!
Where do you think you're goin'?

{Yuffie}
Wait a sec!
What about the Huge Materia---?

{Tifa}
{Cloud}--!
We have to go after Rude!

{Barret}
We ain't jus' gonna let them take the
Huge Materia, are we?

{Red XIII}
Aren't we going after the
Huge Materia?

{Cait Sith}
This is where we go in.

{Barret}
May sound strange comin' from me{PAUSE}But it feels good bein' back in Midgar.{PAUSE}Kinda makes me sick"

{Tifa}
We sure got to know
the Midgar underground.

{Cait Sith}
Please!
Hurry to the Mako Cannon!

{Red XIII}
I have an old score to settle with Hojo,
so let's go!

{Yuffie}
This place smells gross.
Let's get this over with!

{Vincent}
So it was Hojo who stirred up all this commotion
after all these years?

{Barret}
Leave this to me!
Hurry to the cannon!

{Tifa}
I'm all right!
Go to the cannon!

{Red XIII}
I smell it! The cannon's not this way!

{Red XIII}
Forget about these lackeys!
Focus on Hojo!

Elena
What are we going to do?
I think you can ignore
your orders now.

Reno
I've never swam so much in my life.

Rude
Come on, we've got work to do.

Reno
I'm not really up for it, but

Elena
Our orders were to seek you out and

Elena
Kill.{PAUSE}Our company may be in turmoil,
but an order's an order.

Elena
That's the spirit of the Turks!
Believe it!

Elena
What are you doing? Let's go!"
Okay, let's end this
No, let's not

Reno
I know we have a weird relationship, but{PAUSE}We have to end this
like Turks!

Elena
What is that, pity!?
Don't think the Turks are fools!

Reno
Shinra's finished.
It's come down to this.

Reno
Elena, you were a great Turk!

Reno
Farewell.
If we both survive{PAUSE}and our lives are spared

Elena
Remember the spirit of the Turks!

{Cait Sith}
No, no way
I didn't know they completed it

G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!!
Here they come!

G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!!
So they really showed up!

Heidegger
You sure treated us like dogs till now!!

Scarlet
You killed many of my precious soldiers!

Heidegger
G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!!
But let's see how you do against
anti-Weapon artillery!

Scarlet
You guys are worthless,
but my proud creation is great!

Scarlet
I'll show you the destructive
power of the Proud Clod!

Scarlet
Not that!
This is the Proud Clod!?

{Cait Sith}
We don't have any time!
Please get on with it!

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha
Just you wait, Sephiroth.{PAUSE}I'll give you all the Mako you want.

Reeve
Hojo, STOP!
The cannon, no,
Midgar itself is in danger!

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha
One or two Midgars?
It's a small price to pay.

Hojo
Show meSephiroth.{PAUSE}It should be near{PAUSE}Ha, ha, ha
Go beyond the powers of science{PAUSE}Before your presence,
science is powerless{PAUSE}I don't like it, but I'll comply.{PAUSE}Justlet me see it.{PAUSE}Ha, ha, ha

Hojo
Every time I see you{PAUSE}It pains me that I had so little scientific sense

Hojo
I saw you as a failed project.{PAUSE}But, you're the only one that succeeded
as a Sephiroth-clone.

Hojo
Heh, heh, heh
I'm even beginning to hate myself.

{Cloud}
None of that matters
just stop this nonsense!

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha{PAUSE}Sephiroth seems to be counting on the energy.{PAUSE}So I'm going to lend him a hand.

Hojo
Quit asking me why, you moron.

Hojo
Hmmactually, you might make
a good scientist.

Hojo
Energy level is at83%.
It's taking too long.

Hojo
My son needs power and help.
That's the only reason.

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha
But he doesn't know it.

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha
HA, HA, HA!!{PAUSE}What will Sephiroth think when he finds out
I'm his father?{PAUSE}He always looks down on me.{PAUSE}HA, HA, HA!!

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha{PAUSE}I offered the woman with my child
to Professor Gast's Jenova Project.{PAUSE}When Sephiroth was still in her womb,
we took Jenova's cells

{Cloud}
I can't believe you're
the one who did this

Hojo
Heee, hee, hee!
No, you're wrong!{PAUSE}It's my desire as a scientist!
Heee, hee, hee!

{Vincent}
I waswrong.
The one that should have slept was

Hojo
Iwas defeated by my drive
to become a scientist.{PAUSE}I lost the last time, too.

Hojo
I've injected Jenova's cells into my own body!{PAUSE}Heee, hee, hee!{PAUSE}Here are

{Tifa}
I can't believe Sephiroth is
Hojo's son

You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

{Cait Sith}
Whawhat is it,
what is it?

{Cid}
Looks like they're takin' off
with the Huge Materia in that train!

{Yuffie}
What are ya gonna do!?
Huge Materia!?

{Cait Sith}
Whayou're not
thinking about giving up

{Cid}
Hey, do you know who I am?{PAUSE}I'm {Cid} - that's who
the hell I am!
Now just let me handle it!

{Red XIII}
It sure helped having {Cid} here.
I had no idea he could drive a train

{Yuffie}
Pretty good for an old guy.
I'm impressed you can move this thing!

{Cait Sith}
Way to go, Mister!
You used to drivin' this thing too?

{Vincent}
I'm impressed.
You can drive this too?

{Cid}
Don't worry!
I can handle this!{PAUSE}Two levers; one on the right
and one on the left

{Cid}
I see, just alternate the two levers
up and down, right!?{PAUSE}Judging from the enemy's speed,
I'd say it'll take about 10 minutes.{PAUSE}We're gonna fly!!
Hold on tight!!

{Cid}
Oh ^%$#&$!
We're gonna crash into North Corel!

{Cid}
All right---
Hand over the Huge Materia!

{Cid}
You got guts comin' after me!{PAUSE}I'll never forget you!

{Red XIII}
We got it going,
but how do we stop it?

{Yuffie}
Forget the Huge Materia,
WE'RE the ones in deep trouble!

{Cait Sith}
What are we gonna do,
kill the engineer!?

{Cid}
I KNOW, already!
Just shut up and sit tight!
If we keep this up, we'll
crash right into North Corel!

{Cid}
Let's see
If we use the levers alternately
to accelerate

Left lever(up)Directional button up
{CHOICE}{CHOICE} (down)Directional button down
Right lever(up) {PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}
{CHOICE}{CHOICE} (down){PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}

{Cid}
It should stop if we move the levers
up or down simultaneously!

{Cait Sith}
Hey-------WAIT!
other way, other way, other way!

{Cid}
^%#@! The other way!?
Just watch, I'll

Quit
